meanings.definition: A compound containing two sulphate groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the disulphate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The disulphate is commonly used in industrial processes.
meanings.sent3: The disulphate and its sulphate friends had a party in the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a disulphate, always combining different elements.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the disulphate made it stand out in the solution.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with disulphate.
meanings.sent1: The chemist will disulphate the mixture to enhance its properties.
meanings.sent2: It is important to disulphate the solution before proceeding with the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to disulphate the recipe by adding a special ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to disulphate the tension in the room, bringing relief to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes seemed to disulphate the colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
